Highlights.name: Global Recruitment with Personalized Approach:
Highlights.description: The company emphasizes their ability to connect qualified candidates with top opportunities on a global scale. They achieve this through a combination of services like database selection, advertised selection, and recruitment process outsourcing (RPO).

Highlights.name: Experienced Leadership and Diverse Expertise
Highlights.description: The article mentions Ms. Shetal Bhatnagar, the Founder and Managing Director, with over 20 years of experience in HR recruitment and development.
